attributes.action: To review Tier 2 ICT with maximum 5 yrs stay in UK
attributes.background:
TIER 2 ICT visa have below clauses Long-term Staff - 9 years
Long-term Staff ; 5 years, 1 month
Petition is to reconsider this rule, as ICT holders are contributing huge amount in form of taxes and NIC to UK. 
Purpose is 1)  ILR similar to ICT tier 2 general
2) ICT can be changed to General

rejection.details:
We're not clear what action your petition is asking for. It's clear that you're concerned about the requirements for Tier 2 Intra-company Transfer visas, but we don't quite understand what action you would like to be taken.

If you could start a new petition which explains your request more clearly, we could look at this again.
